lead_paragraph: KUSHNER--Lester. The Board of Directors of Career Bridges mourn the loss of our fellow board member Lester Kushner. His many years of loyal service as secretary, his positive attitude, his love of opera and passionate commitment to our mission of helping young opera singers will be sorely missed. 1/3
